Articles.Content:
Hi all,

Does anyone know if Duna still has rocks on the surface, I can't seem to find them anymore. If you know please leave an image showing the location(s).

Big thanks!

Chris (Heretic391)

Rocks as in ground scatter, they should be everywhere? Make sure in your settings you have ground scatter turned on, and if you want alot of rocks turn it on high. Is there a certain easter egg you are wondering about?
Thanks a lot! I'm planning to hide a few ships in these rockets since they have no hit box. It's for a cinematic I'm planning. This is unrelated to Easter eggs.
